Hey Bartender

Created March 1, 2015

  • design
  • development
  • javascript

View the live site Check it out on Github

‘Hey Bartender!’ is a signature drink generator, created to take the guesswork out of providing guests with a suitable and delicious cocktail.

This site uses Absolute Vodka’s API to match a base spirit and flavor profile to a list of potential cocktails. One of these cocktails is chosen and served up to the user.

Cheers!
